name: Undead Blackout
description: Fight hordes of the undead in this challenging top-down shooter inspired by the likes of Super Smash TV and Resident Evil.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64 bit (requires 64 bit OS) Processor: Dual Core Processor, 2.5 GHz or higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DX11 compatible video card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Microsoft Xbox Controller for WindowsÂ® (or equivalent) is recommended. Two controllers are required for two-player modes.
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
